Game_of_Life

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_of_Life.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Cell to create a Cell object with the required variables. A Cell object will represent every one of the alive/dead cells of the game Moreover, the class contains the methods and functions to manage and work with Cell objects.
    Author:
    David Mendez Merino

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell()
        Default constructor for Cell (no parameters)

      • Cell

        public Cell(boolean state,
            boolean new_state,
            int x,
            int y)
        Parameterised constructor for Cell
        Parameters:
        state - Boolean to indicate the state of the cell (True = alive // False = dead)
        new_state - Boolean to indicate the state of the cell in the next generation
        x - int value which indicates the row of the cell within the board
        y - int value which indicates the colum of the cell within the board
